## Registry Cache Module

## Registry Fetcher Module

Handles loading the Quarto extensions registry with caching support.

## search {#symbol-function-search}

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function search(query, options?): Promise<RegistryEntry[]>;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/registry/search.ts:111](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/0316fd26127259fca98c9bd9bc0f5239eb07007f/packages/core/src/registry/search.ts#L111)

Search for extensions in the registry.

### Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                           | Description                                       |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| `query`   | `string`                                                       | Search query (searches name, description, topics) |
